item.title: Samantha add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "If you are going through hell, keep going." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Deepak Chopra
item.description: "Don't try to steer the river." -- Deepak Chopra

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Karl Marx
item.description: "The oppressed are allowed once every few years to decide which particular representatives of the oppressing class are to represent and repress them." -- Karl Marx

item.title: Samantha add a quote by John Stuart Mill
item.description: "the only way in which a human being can make some approach to knowing the whole of a subject, is by hearing what can be said about it by persons of every variety of opinion, and studying all modes in which it can be looked at by every character of mind. No wise man ever acquired his wisdom in any mode but this; nor is it in the nature of human intellect to become wise in any other manner." -- John Stuart Mill

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Live in each season as it passes; breathe the air, drink the drink, taste the fruit, and resign yourself to the influence of the earth." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Edwin A. Abbott
item.description: "...learn this lesson, that to be self-contented is to be vile and ignorant, and that to aspire is better than to be blindly and impotently happy.." -- Edwin A. Abbott

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today was good. Today was fun. Tomorrow is another one." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Samantha add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "They went in and out of each other's minds without any effort." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Ovid
item.description: "I flee who chases me and chase who flees me." -- Ovid

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Ovid
item.description: "Chance is always powerful. Let your hook be always cast; in the pool where you least expect it, there will be a fish." -- Ovid

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "So many people walk around with a meaningless life. They seem half-asleep, even when they're busy doing things they think are important. This is because they're chasing the wrong things. The way you get meaning into your life is to devote yourself to loving others, devote yourself to your community around you, and devote yourself to creating something that gives you purpose and meaning." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "Just because something bears the aspect of the inevitable one should not, therefore, go along willingly with it." -- Philip K. Dick

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Anne Sexton
item.description: "As it has been said: Love and a cough cannot be concealed. Even a small cough. Even a small love." -- Anne Sexton

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "It was true that I didnâ€™t have much ambition, but there ought to be a place for people without ambition, I mean a better place than the one usually reserved. How in the hell could a man enjoy being awakened at 6:30 a.m. by an alarm clock, leap out of bed, dress, force-feed, shit, piss, brush teeth and hair, and fight traffic to get to a place where essentially you made lots of money for somebody else and were asked to be grateful for the opportunity to do so?" -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "The problem with the world is that the intelligent people are full of doubts, while the stupid ones are full of confidence." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Samantha add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You don't get to choose if you get hurt in this world...but you do have some say in who hurts you. I like my choices." -- John Green
